arts.ttl: Report: Electric Bristol City wrap up 2024 in BS3 with Ashton Gate win over Portsmouth
arts.sum: Bristol City rounded off 2024 with a commanding 3-0 win over Portsmouth at Ashton Gate thanks to a brace from Anis Mehmeti and a first-half goal from Rob Dickie. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth's relegation rivals could lose £3.5m star as Stoke City eye former Nottingham Forest boss
arts.sum: The latest news from across the Championship as Portsmouth continue to battle against relegation.

arts.ttl: 'It's really low' - Portsmouth boss makes honest squad admission after Bristol City defeat
arts.sum: John Mousinho confessed the mood in the Pompey camp is 'really low' following today's thumping at the the hands of Bristol City.

arts.ttl: 'We talked about' - Bristol City boss makes Fratton Park claim after win against Portsmouth
arts.sum: The Bristol City manager reflected on his side's mixed fortunes against Portsmouth in the Championship this season.

arts.ttl: 'I thought it was for the best': Portsmouth boss defends shock team selection in dismal Bristol City defeat
arts.sum: John Mousinho reflected on his shock Pompey team selection and insisted: I thought it was the best thing to do.

arts.ttl: Bristol City 3 Portsmouth 0: Neil Allen's verdict - Dreadful Blues send transfer reminder as fringe players fail
arts.sum: This was no clever message from Pompey’s head coach, it was stating the blindingly obvious.

arts.ttl: 'Very nervous. Load of rubbish. All time low.' - the full-time verdict as Portsmouth thrashed by Bristol City
arts.sum: Pompey were on the receiving end of a 3-0 defeat to Bristol City at Ashton Gate in their final game of 2024.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Portsmouth: Mehmeti double sees Reds secure back-to-back wins

arts.ttl: Anis Mehmeti double sets up Bristol City win over Portsmouth
arts.sum: Defender Rob Dickie rounded off a 3-0 victory.

arts.ttl: 'Depth is absolutely shocking. Madness' - The half-time verdict as Portsmouth trail 3-0 to Bristol City
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been reacting to the first-half performance witnessed at Ashton Gate this afternoon.
